com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class FormRecordPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.FormRecordPane

  • public class FormRecordPane
extends java.lang.Object
    A panel that holds a grid form of fields from a record. Fields are laid out in tabs by field group if there are field groups, and optionally in sub-panels defined by (grid_x, grid_y) values.

    Usage:

    • Instantiate the panel.
    • Set the edit mode.
    • Set the master record.
    • Add fields optionally indicating the grid coordinates of the sub-panel.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • addField

        public void addField(java.lang.String alias,
                     int column,
                     int row)
        Add a field setting its grid coordinates. Grid coordinates are relative to the field group of the field, that is, the tab where the field group will be assigned. Grid coordinates are recommended to be set sequentially.
        Parameters:
        alias - The field alias.
        column - The column index.
        row - The row index.

      • getClearFields

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClearFields(Field field,
                                                        java.util.List<Field> fields,
                                                        Relation skipRelation)
        Returns the list of clear edit field names. If the field is a segment of another multi-segment relation, add clear fields for the rest of the multi-segment fields.
        Parameters:
        field - Scan field.
        fields - List of fields.
        skipRelation - Relation to skip.
        Returns:
        The list of field names.

        Check if all the local fields of the relation are present in the list of fields.
        Parameters:
        relation - The relation.
        fields - The source list of fields.
        Returns:
        A boolean.

      • fillKeyAndRefreshFields

        private void fillKeyAndRefreshFields(java.util.List<Field> fields,
                                     Relation relation,
                                     java.util.List<Field> localKeyFields,
                                     java.util.List<Field> foreignKeyFields,
                                     java.util.List<Field> foreignRefreshFields)
        Fill the lists of local and foreign key fields, and foreign refresh fields.
        Parameters:
        fields - The master list of fields.
        relation - The relation.
        localKeyFields - List of local key fields to fill.
        foreignKeyFields - List of foreign key fields to fill.
        foreignRefreshFields - List of foreign refresh fields to fill.

      • getRelation

        private Relation getRelation(Field field,
                             java.util.List<Field> fields)
        Returns the relation from all the relations associated to the argument field, where all the local fields are present in the list of fields, and the argument field is the last field of the relation.
        Parameters:
        field - The scanned field.
        fields - The source list of fields.
        Returns:
        The required relation or null.
